tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type TEXT,
  route_id INT,
  distance NUMERIC,
  avg_speed NUMERIC,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    route_description TEXT,
    start_station_id INT,
    end_station_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_passengers (
    passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    start_station_id INT,
    end_station_id INT,
    ticket_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    registration_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    time TIME NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    traffic_count INT NOT NULL,
    average_speed FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE infrastructure_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE road_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    condition VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transportation_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    speed REAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Infrastructure_Planning (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    infrastructure_type VARCHAR(100),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Development_Projects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    budget REAL,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Public_Policy (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_description TEXT,
    effective_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_results TEXT
);
